Posts.EditableText:
A cordial greeting. I'm participating in an interactive fiction competition, the RAYUELAJAM, and I'm using squiffy for it. The Squiffy editor, by default, only highlights sections and passages, everything else is not distinguished from normal text. So I was playing a bit with the code of the program and I have made it look more showy, and of course, more natural for a programmer.

![tich.io](https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzE5Mzg3OTMucG5n/original/D83Y4c.png)

To get this result, replace the file squiffy-editor.js in the squiffy folder with this one: [squiffy-editor.js](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1J906r414_BPQ-AjhntK0uXJOp7rfFrsK/view?usp=sharing) (remember to make a backup of the file ... for that matter)

For pleasure the colors were made. Until the next guys!
Posts.HTML:
A cordial greeting. I'm participating in an interactive fiction competition, the RAYUELAJAM, and I'm using squiffy for it. The Squiffy editor, by default, only highlights sections and passages, everything else is not distinguished from normal text. So I was playing a bit with the code of the program and I have made it look more showy, and of course, more natural for a programmer.

To get this result, replace the file squiffy-editor.js in the squiffy folder with this one: squiffy-editor.js (remember to make a backup of the file ... for that matter)

For pleasure the colors were made. Until the next guys!
